verses.verse: Gather yourselves together, <S%H7197><s%> yea, gather together, <S%H7197><s%> O nation <S%H1471><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> desired; <S%H3700><s%>

Before <S%H2962><s%> the decree <S%H2706><s%> bring forth, <S%H3205><s%> before the day <S%H3117><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> as the chaff, <S%H4671><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, before <S%H2962><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you.

Seek <S%H1245><s%> ye <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> ye meek <S%H6035><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have wrought <S%H6466><s%> his judgment; <S%H4941><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> meekness: <S%H6038><s%> it may be <S%H194><s%> ye shall be hid <S%H5641><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> anger. <S%H639><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> Gaza <S%H5804><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> forsaken, <S%H5800><s%> and Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> a desolation: <S%H8077><s%> they shall drive out <S%H1644><s%> Ashdod <S%H795><s%> at the noon day, <S%H6672><s%> and Ekron <S%H6138><s%> shall be rooted up. <S%H6131><s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> coast, <S%H2256><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%> of the Cherethites! <S%H3774><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is against <S%H5921><s%> you; O Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> I will even destroy <S%H6><s%> thee, that there shall be no <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> inhabitant. <S%H3427><s%>
And the sea <S%H3220><s%> coast <S%H2256><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> dwellings <S%H5116><s%> and cottages <S%H3741><s%> for shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> and folds <S%H1448><s%> for flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

And the coast <S%H2256><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> for the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> they shall feed <S%H7462><s%> thereupon: <S%H5921><s%> in the houses <S%H1004><s%> of Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> shall they lie down <S%H7257><s%> in the evening: <S%H6153><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> shall visit <S%H6485><s%> them, and turn away <S%H7725><s%> their captivity. <S%H7622><s%>

I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and the revilings <S%H1421><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> <S%H853><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> and magnified <S%H1431><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> their border. <S%H1366><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> as I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Surely <S%H3588><s%> Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> as Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> as Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> even the breeding <S%H4476><s%> of nettles, <S%H2738><s%> and saltpits, <S%H4417><s%> <S%H4379><s%> and a perpetual <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> desolation: <S%H8077><s%> the residue <S%H7611><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> shall spoil <S%H962><s%> them, and the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of my people <S%H1471><s%> shall possess <S%H5157><s%> them.

This <S%H2063><s%> shall they have for <S%H8478><s%> their pride, <S%H1347><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> and magnified <S%H1431><s%> themselves against <S%H5921><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will be terrible <S%H3372><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> them: for <S%H3588><s%> he will famish <S%H7329><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> and men shall worship <S%H7812><s%> him, every one <S%H376><s%> from his place, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> the isles <S%H339><s%> of the heathen. <S%H1471><s%>
Ye <S%H859><s%> Ethiopians <S%H3569><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> ye <S%H1992><s%> shall be slain <S%H2491><s%> by my sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And he will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the north, <S%H6828><s%> and destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H853><s%> Assyria; <S%H804><s%> and will make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> Nineveh <S%H5210><s%> a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> and dry <S%H6723><s%> like a wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And flocks <S%H5739><s%> shall lie down <S%H7257><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her, all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the nations: <S%H1471><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> the cormorant <S%H6893><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> the bittern <S%H7090><s%> shall lodge <S%H3885><s%> in the upper lintels <S%H3730><s%> of it; their voice <S%H6963><s%> shall sing <S%H7891><s%> in the windows; <S%H2474><s%> desolation <S%H2721><s%> shall be in the thresholds: <S%H5592><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he shall uncover <S%H6168><s%> the cedar work. <S%H731><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the rejoicing <S%H5947><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> carelessly, <S%H983><s%> that said <S%H559><s%> in her heart, <S%H3824><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am, and there is none <S%H657><s%> beside <S%H5750><s%> me: how <S%H349><s%> is she become <S%H1961><s%> a desolation, <S%H8047><s%> a place for beasts <S%H2416><s%> to lie down <S%H4769><s%> in! every one <S%H3605><s%> that passeth <S%H5674><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> her shall hiss, <S%H8319><s%> and wag <S%H5128><s%> his hand. <S%H3027><s%>
